projects.title: AI powered Data and Document Copilot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot agent built with React, TypeScript, and MUI provides an intuitive messenger-like chat experience with AI-generated responses. It enhances user interaction with highly user-friendly tables and visualizations, making data easier to understand. The chatbot includes a PDF viewer for document access, chat history management, and the ability to export conversations to PDF, with the option to select specific chats for export. The seamless UI ensures a smooth, interactive experience while leveraging AI to deliver insightful and context-aware responses.

projects.title: Code Purity Analyzer
projects.description: Developed a cutting-edge Code Analyzer Tool with an intuitive User Interface using Node.js. This tool detects code smells and suboptimal coding practices, empowering developers to enhance code quality. It highlights files with potential issues, underlines problematic statements, and provides valuable insights such as test coverage percentage. Successfully validated across diverse projects, ensuring accurate and reliable code analysis. It also provides an option to download the reports in pdf format.

projects.title: Traffic Statistics Mobile App
projects.description: Spearheaded the development of a cutting-edge mobile application using React Native, delivering an intuitive and visually appealing user interface for real-time traffic data, including alerts. Leveraged interactive maps and charts powered by Mapbox and ECharts libraries to seamlessly integrate traffic information. This innovative app empowers traffic managers with comprehensive data visualization, enhancing decision-making and response capabilities.
